name: structurizr-azure-devops-task
description: Azure Devops pipeline task for pushing Structurizr workspaces to the Structurizr server
author: Duane McKibbin

inputs.name: serverurl
inputs.label: Structurizr Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the server is you're using self-hosted
inputs.visibleRule: command = push || command = pull || command = lock || command = unlock

inputs.name: workspaceid
inputs.label: Workspace ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique ID of the workspace, find on workspace settings
inputs.visibleRule: command = push || command = pull || command = lock || command = unlock

inputs.name: workspacekey
inputs.label: Workspace Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key of the workspace, find on workspace settings
inputs.visibleRule: command = push || command = pull || command = lock || command = unlock

inputs.name: workspacesecret
inputs.label: Workspace Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Secret of the workspace, find on workspace settings
inputs.visibleRule: command = push || command = pull || command = lock || command = unlock

inputs.name: workspacefile
inputs.label: Workspace File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to Structurizr JSON file/DSL file(s)
inputs.visibleRule: command = push || command = lock || command = unlock || command = validate || command = list || command = export

inputs.name: archive
inputs.label: Archive
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stores the previous version of the remote workspace

inputs.name: merge
inputs.label: Merge
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to merge layout information from the remote workspace
